channel.title: Sting Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Sting news and events.

item.title: Sting 0.08 released
item.description:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/sting-ioc/sting/compare/v0.07...v0.08)
Changes in this release:
* Add some basic documentation on the following topics: - Accessing services managed by the injector * Enhance the error message on unresolved inj

item.title: Sting 0.07 released
item.description:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/sting-ioc/sting/compare/v0.06...v0.07)
Changes in this release:
* Generate an error if a type annotated with `@Injectable` or a method in a `@Fragment` annotated type is annotated with `@Named` and specifies zero

item.title: Sting 0.06 released
item.description:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/sting-ioc/sting/compare/v0.05...v0.06)
Changes in this release:
* If an output method on a `@Injector` annotated type returns a collection then it will now return the same collection if invoked multiple times. *

item.title: Sting 0.05 released
item.description:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/sting-ioc/sting/compare/v0.04...v0.05) [API Differences](/api-diff/?key=sting&old=0.04&new=0.05)
The release includes 3 non breaking API changes.
Changes in this release:
* Add the `@Injector.injectable` paramet

item.title: Sting 0.04 released
item.description:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/sting-ioc/sting/compare/v0.03...v0.04)
Changes in this release:
* Improve the javadocs organization. * Build and measure code size of downstream sample projects to help identify track code size changes as the lib

item.title: Sting 0.03 released
item.description:
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/sting-ioc/sting/compare/v0.02...v0.03)
Changes in this release:
* Improve the POM generated for both the `sting-core` and `sting-processor` modules.

item.title: Sting 0.02 released
item.description:

Changes in this release:
* Upgrade the `org.realityforge.proton` artifacts to version `0.40`. * Stop generating errors if types are annotated with `@Named`, `@Typed` or `@Ea

item.title: Website Launched
item.description:
The website was launched today!
**Features:**
* Basic overview documentation. * [Javadocs](/api/index.html) for the external users of the library.
